com.reportmill.shape

Class RMParentShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • SnapObject
      • com.reportmill.shape.RMShape
        • com.reportmill.shape.RMParentShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMTypes, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReportOwner.ShapeList, RMAnimPathShape.RMAnimPathGroup, RMCrossTab, RMCrossTabFrame, RMDocument, RMFlowShape, RMGraph, RMGraphRPGBar.BarGraphShape2D, RMLabel, RMLabels, RMLineShape, RMNestedDoc, RMPage, RMPolygonShape, RMScene3D, RMSpringShape, RMSwitchShape, RMTable, RMTableGroup, RMTableRowRPG, RMTableRPG

    public class RMParentShape
extends RMShape
    A shape implementation that can have children.

      • divideShapeFromTop

        public RMShape divideShapeFromTop(double anAmount)
        Divides the shape by a given amount from the top. Returns a clone of the given shape with bounds set to the remainder. Divides children among the two shapes (recursively calling divide shape for those straddling).
        Overrides:
        divideShapeFromTop in class RMShape
